name: MedicineWorld
title: Multi-Vendor Medicine Selling Website
features: Users can purchase medicines, view purchase history, and download it.
Sellers can add, update, and delete medicines.
Sellers can request advertisements for their medicines.
technology: React, JavaScript, HTML, Tailwind CSS, CSS3, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase.

name: HelpNexus
title: Volunteer management Website
features: User-friendly platform for volunteer management where a user can create a volunteer need post, update and delete a post, a user can be a volunteer for others post.
A user sees all volunteers post and change page layout. (grid and table format).
technology: React, JavaScript, HTML, Tailwind CSS, CSS3, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase.

name: CraftifyHub
title: Art and Craft store Website
features: Investors must provide added updates and delete their product.
If the user does not register or logged, they cannot Added, updated and deleted any items.
technology: React, JavaScript, HTML, Tailwind CSS, CSS3, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase.

name: LivingNexus
title: Real estate management
features: The website enables users to change information, user can update information, user also can see Profile picture.
The website enables users to login authentication. Users can login with email and password, with google and with GitHub.
technology: React, JavaScript, HTML, Tailwind CSS, CSS3, Firebase.
